Best Mig Welders for Home Use – Top Picks & Reviews

June 7, 2021December 27, 2020 by Brayden
2k
SHARES
ShareTweet

Mig welders are great for welding complex and tricky metals. They are best for welding various metals including aluminum. But for home tasks, they are best as they are easy to use and easy to learn plus can carry out daily routine welds with no issue at all. So here is the list of best MIG welders for home use that can meet your needs right away and they are the best home mig welders currently available in the market.

Also Read: Best Mig Welders for Aluminum

Best MiG Welder for Home Use
Hobart Handler 140
Forney Easy Weld 140 MP
Lincoln Electric K2185-1
Miller Electric Millermatic
Forney Easy Weld 261
Hobart Handler 500553
Hobart 500536

List of 7 Best MiG Welder for Home Use

The MIG welders are the best choice if someone needs to meet their routine welding operations hence they are extremely easy to operate as well. All the best home usage MIG welders mentioned below are picked up after deep research and reviewing each item with extreme care and upon the basis of experimentations and real-time user experience.

Amazon’s Choice

1. Hobart Handler 140

Specifications:

  • Weight: 57 pounds
  • Duty Cycles: 20% @ 90A
  • Dimensions: 19 x 11 x 13 inches
  • Input Voltage: 115
  • Amperage range: 25-140V
  • Warranty: 5-years
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Hobart 140, home use mig welder, is a great machine that can perform extremely well and great option for low budget buyers. It is the best mig welder for home use as it can easily carry heavy duty tasks as well as basic and simple welding tasks without any issue.

Hobart 140 is capable to weld materials at 25 amperes which can go as high as 140 amperes. This is extremely good for home users as most of the items are weld at these amperes ranges.

The voltage input is also very user friendly as it can easily work on simple and most common power supply of 115 volts and can weld all kind of metals without leaving any dirt behind.

Furthermore, this best mig welder for home use has 20 % duty cycles, which simply means that it is not only time-effective but, also a cool welding machine that cannot turn into heating machine due to heavy load.

Moreover, the super cool feature of this great mig welder for home use is that it has a 5 range voltage, an adjustable wire feed control, and a selector to make it stronger thus; it is a more versatile machine than the others.

This 5-range voltage control and adjustable wire feed speed control feature produces extremely stable arcs and welds due to stabilization not matter what the thickness level is. This is a great welder that can be used as flux-cored welding due to no requirement of gas hence; it becomes capable of welding at various conditions.

Gas welding via solid wire welding gives more super cool finished welds and is extremely grateful for indoor use whereas, flux welding without use of gas becomes handy for outdoor welds.

It is the best budget mig welder for home use as it is extremely lightweight and design is compact so that you can easily carry it anywhere.

Apart from this the best thing regarding its movement and portability is that it provide a free cart along with wheels that can help welder to move welding machine anywhere where welding is required. This is entirely different from all other welders at this price range.

The material quality and build quality of this machine is tremendous. Users can easily set up this machine in less than 10 minutes. Remember that all these features are offered at extremely low prices with all safety measures kept built-in into this super cool home use MIG welder.

It is a safe machine for home purposes as it offers all the safety features like overcurrent protection and thermal overload protection which turns off the machine immediately if the machine gets near to overheating.

Check it out if you’re looking for Best Quality Mig Welders.

Pros
  • Stable arc
  • Wires and Flux Core welding
  • Lightweight
  • Durable
  • Overload protection
Cons
  • Not made for heavy industrial duty tasks
Check Price on Amazon
Premium Choice

2. Forney Easy Weld 140 MP

Specifications:

  • Weight: 25.8 pounds
  • Dimensions: 14.19 x 19.31 x 11.61 inches
  • Input Voltage: 120V
  • Amperage range: 10-140amps
  • Warranty: 1-yearsv
Check On Amazon

Overview:

The Forney Easy Weld 140 MP is an extremely inexpensive home use mig welder which offers almost 4 modes of welding that are MIG, DC TIG, DC stick and flux core welding which is outstanding to get in such a price range.

It is set to default current input which is 120 volts and it is mostly found in every household. Due to DC TIG mode, Forney easy weld 140 can easily weld aluminum and provides an option to weld high thickened aluminum of up to 1/8” with MIG process and spool gun.

The amperage range of this best MIG welder for home use is really worth mentioning. In this price range, it has fabulous amperage range of 10 to 140amps which is extremely great for thinner and thicker metals. Apart from this, it is extremely lightweight as well with only 24 pounds of weight.

This starter mig welder for home use is best for DIY projects and the good thing about this welder is that it can easily be utilized for professional tasks as well due to its great amperage range.

Other than that, the welder is super easy to use and the design is compact enough to take it anywhere. This welder is mostly used by home welders and also highly demanded as well.

The quality of this inexpensive home MIG welder is totally opposite from its price, like it extremely durable although sold at an extremely low price. Another great thing about this low priced machine is that it gives Infinite voltage and wire feed speed controls that are hugely helpful in providing nice and clean welds.

If we sum up, this is the best MIG welder for home use that is equipped with 3-in-1 processes and offers great features which are hard to find in such low price welder.

Pros
  • Easy to setup
  • Infinite voltage and wire feed speed controls
  • Light and Compact
  • 3-in-1 processes
  • Inexpensive
  • High rated MIG welder
Cons
  • If want to use as TIG then have to purchase accessories separately

Inexpensive Mig

3. Lincoln Electric K2185-1

Specifications:

  • Weight: 26 pounds
  • Duty cycles: 20% @ 70A
  • Dimensions: 18 x 10.3 x 16.75 inches
  • Input Voltage: 115 volts
  • Amperage range: 88amps
  • Warranty: Manufacturer Warranty
Check On Amazon

Overview:

1

This Lincoln electric is best little welder as well as it offers such a great features that are truly helpful and handy for home users.

This tiny welding equipment of Lincoln Brand is great for auto body works. It can be utilized along with two welding forms which are argon gas mix or glassless flux-cored wire. It is a cheaper and budget MIG welder for home use and also light in weight as well.

This inexpensive mig welding equipment has two modes of welding, wire welding and a gasless flux core welding which can be used for indoor and outdoor welds respectively.

It is the best hobbyist mig welder for home use as it can easily weld metals of up to 24 gauge and up tp 1/8” thickness. The Lincoln electric K2185 can run on standard current input of 115 volts and give the best results.

The ampere range of this Lincoln electric K2185 is 88 Amperes which is good for professional welding tasks and the stand-out feature is that it has 4 voltage settings to give premium finish no matter how high or low the fluctuations are and so that it can weld various metals of different size and thicknesses.

Similarly, the duty cycles are also good. It has 20% duty cycles at 70amps. It is tremendously lightweight home use mig welder with only 26 pounds weight along with easy to carry handle place on top of this welding machine.

As mentioned earlier, Lincoln electric k2185 is a flexible machine which can weld different metals of different sizes and thickness due to dual welding modes (Flux core and Wire) and, different voltage settings it becomes easy to use this welder for different tasks.

Moreover, the super cool feature of this high rated welding machine is that it is equipped with cold contractor thermal overload function that is utilized to avoid the wires from heating up and keeps them cool to enhance the overall life of the welder.

The fans installed outside this welder also help to keep the machine cool further and provide proper and required ventilation to avoid overheating issues.

Summing up, this is a great home use MIG welder someone requires for home and it can easily carry out heavy-duty and normal welding tasks.

Pros
  • Multi welding modes
  • 4 Voltage settings for different thickness levels
  • Extremely lightweight
  • Cold contractor thermal overload function
  • Proper ventilation
  • Inexpensive
Cons
  • Cannot weld high thickness metals

Dual Voltage

4. Miller Electric Millermatic

Specifications:

  • Weight: 0.01 ounces
  • Duty cycles: 20% @ 70A
  • Dimensions: 23.8 x 15.2 x 16.2 inches
  • Input Voltage: 230 volts
  • Amperage range: 30-230A
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Miller welding is another super cool MIG welder for home use that is better for high-end purchasers. It is a pricy machine containing more features than the others and better build quality due to high price range.

The Miller Electric Millermatic is a dual voltage home use MIG welder that has completely different set of features than the other MIG welders. It can weld aluminum and can work with different metals of up to 18ga 3/8” mild steel and 24ga 3/8” stainless steel respectively.

The machine is powerful and the brand is extremely trustable. The Millermatic 211 is good for DIY tasks and small garage or professional welding tasks. It is also equipped with dual welding modes, Gasless and Wire welding. 

Other than this, this best home shop mig welder has advanced Auto-SetTM to provide pre-set control modes to the welder without requiring to set settings from the start.

Moreover, Miller electric millermatic if equipped with Auto Spoolgun Detect, Angled Cast-Aluminum Drive System, Thermal Overload Protection, and Fan-on-Demand features which are really helpful for smooth and clean welding projects.

Similar to this, Millermatic comes with high amperage range so you are not going to face any issue while welding thick metals and the range is 30-230Amps.

Furthermore, it is equipped with Smooth-StartTM which helps to provide splatter-less start and welding. The thermal overload protection also helps to keep the machine cool and protected from overheating issues.

To conclude, it is the best MIG welder for home use and it is extremely quiet and excellent for professional welder.

Pros
  • Dual voltage
  • High amperage range
  • Weld aluminum
  • Fan-on-demand
  • Angled Cast-Aluminum Drive System and Smooth-StartTM
Cons
  • Expensive
Check Price on Amazon
Amazon’s Choice

5. Forney Easy Weld 261

Specifications:

  • Weight: 19 pounds
  • Duty cycles: 30% @ 90A
  • Dimensions: 23.8 x 15.2 x 16.2 inches
  • Input Voltage: 120 volts
  • Amperage range: 140A
  • Warranty: 1-Year
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Forney Easy Weld 261 is the cheapest of all and the best MIG welder for home use. In spite of being cheapest, it is yet the most powerful and most trusted household welder.

Forney Easy Weld 261 is one of the best MIG welders out there in the market and suits all beginners, professionals, and low budget users by providing all the features that are truly and completely required by the majority of welders.

It functions as marketed and it is an excellent MIG welder for home use in terms of safety as it offers voltage regulator to protect welders from harmful electric shock.

Forney is famous for producing remarkable welders and maintains its quality. Similar to this, this time as well they have kept the quality and gave tremendous machine in terms of welding, equipment life, and quality.

It is even more lightweight than Forney easy weld 140 with only 19 pounds weight which makes it a super easy machine to carry and offers the same amperage range of 140 amperes.

It offers a great duty cycle of 30% at 90A but offers only Gasless/Fluxed core welding mode. The voltage input is standard 120 Volts and offers portable torch wrap infinite voltage and wire feed speed control.

Forney Easy Weld 261 is equipped with an 8-inch ground clump 8-inch MIG gun, integrated handle with torch wrap and 20A-15A adapters for quick start.

For more peace of mind, Forney Easy Weld 261 home use MIG welder comes with a 1-year warranty so that if anything happens to the welder the user should not get worried regarding the welder.

Pros
  • Extensively lightweight
  • High Amperage range and duty cycles
  • 1-year warranty
  • Extremely cheap
  • Durable and strong
  • Super user-friendly
Cons
  • Compatible with Forney parts only and has only Fluxed Core Welding

Amazon’s Choice

6. Hobart Handler 500553

Specifications:

  • Weight: 87.6 pounds
  • Duty cycles: 20%@ 90A and 30% @ 150A
  • Dimensions: 24 x 18.6 x 13.2 inches
  • Input Voltage: 210 volts
  • Amperage range: 140A
  • Warranty: 3-Year
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Hobart is extremely trustable brand in the field of producing welding machines for various users. The best and cool thing about Hobart before coming towards the review is that it never compromises on the quality of its equipments.

Hobart Handler 500553 is the best mig welder for home use with variety of features. It offers 115 and 210 Volts current input due to which it can also be called as dual volt home use mig welder and provides good amperage range of 150 Amperes.

Apart from this, Hobart Handler 500553 also has good amount of duty cycles which are necessary for continuous flow of work without heating up the welder and offers 20% of duty cycles at 90amps whereas, 30% of high duty cycles at 150amps.

Moreover, it offers 7 voltage settings which are familiar to the previous one welder and can help to increase the accuracy and versatility during welding various metals.

Similar to previous few models, Hobart Handler 500553 also provides Overload and thermal protection to avoid overheating of the machine and turn it off automatically when it reaches down to certain level.

The cool thing about this machine is that it already includes Built-in gas solenoid valve and dual-gauge regulator with gas hose in the box so you don’t have to purchase it down separately.

It is ideal welding equipment for users who like to do DIY tasks or heavy-duty industrial or maintenance tasks. It can perform high-level welds easily.

The most highlighted feature apart from all the cool features of this user-friendly welder is that it is backed up with a 3-years of long warranty which provides peace of mind while purchasing down this item.

Summing up, Hobart Handler 500553 is an easy-to-use MIG welder for every kind of user no matter what experience level he or she has yet, it is the most user-friendly device and functions straightaway.

Pros
  • Dual Volt
  • Easy to use
  • Flexible
  • Longer warranty period
  • Overload and Thermal protection
Cons
  • Heavy and not ideal for industrial welds

Best for Heavy Duty Task

7. Hobart 500536

Specifications:

  • Weight: 226 pounds
  • Duty cycles: 100% @ 140amps, 30% @ 250amps
  • Dimensions: 36.5 x 18.9 x 31.5 inches
  • Input Voltage: 151 volts
  • Amperage range: 30-250A
  • Warranty: 5-3-1 years warranty
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Hobart 500536 is the heaviest welding machine on our list of best mig welder for home use. It offers ultra premium enriched features that makes it truly a giant welding machine. It has no limitations when it comes to its capabilities and abilities to carry out various welding operations and tasks simultaneously.

As mentioned earlier it is the most expensive mig in this category yet it is packed with most beautiful features and purely made for heavy duty tasks.

Packed with high amperage range of 30 to 250 amperes, it is the most powerful home welder of our list and provides flawless welds.

It easily welds aluminum and stainless steel and other metals without any issue. Apart from this, the 200Amp gun is capable of producing a high-grade arc.

The good thing is that the company has attached wheels along with it so that user can easily move this machine in the required place as the weight is 224 pounds which is extremely high.

The current input is 151 volts and backed up with 5-3-1 year warranty time period which is 5 years for its transformers, stabilizers, reactors, rectifiers, rotors, stators and brushes, 3 years for its drive systems, PC boards, solenoid valves, switches and controls, and 1 year for its plasma torches, MIG guns, relays, contactor, triggers, regulator, accessories, spoolguns, battery, field options and running gears.

This unit also comes with 90-days of limited warranty for industrial use which is not offered on any other mig machine.

Furthermore, the duty cycles are also high for this unit and they are seen as almost 100% at 140amps whereas, 30% at 250amps

So if we close up, this is the best MIG welder for home use and it is the beast machine amongest the all.

Pros
  • 5-3-1 years warranty
  • High duty cycles
  • 200Amp gun
  • High Amperage range
  • Extremely powerful
Cons
  • Expensive
Check Price on Amazon

FAQ’s

The most commonly known MIG welders are the best and easy source of welding with extremely great finish.  The MIG welders allows home users, hobbyist, professionals, farmer, industrials, garage repairers, and DIY’s to weld all kind of metals from 24-gauge and up to 1/2-inch thickness.

There are many MIG welders available in the market for various users but the right decision completely depends upon the user’s needs and requirements as well as his budget. Typically Forney Easy Weld 140 and Hobart 140 are seen and demanded as the best mig welders for home tasks although there are many more welding machines that meet different requirements of different users such as Hobart Handler 500553 for high end users and Lincoln electric k2185 for medium range users.

There are two modes of weldings generally seen in MIG welding and welders. One is Wire welding and the second one is Fluxed core welding which is also known as gasless welding which is ideal for outdoors. As mentioned if user is using Fluxed Core welding which is made to weld metals without use of gas then there is no requirement for gas for welding.

Definitely yes, 100% Argon can be utilized to weld steel, but chances are that user is mostly going to get unattractive welding beads that are large and narrow along with weakened weld undercuts. Similar the case would be with the Mild steel MIG welds while utilizing 100% Argon shielding gas and user will lose ductility during mild steel welds and the welds will be weak as well as brittle.

Conclusion

Mig welders are a great choice if you are just starting out or you need a welder in your homes to take out care of routine welding operations. They are easy, straightforward, inexpensive, and most importantly convenient when it comes to welding and provide extremely nice and clean welds.

The list of best MIG welder for home use contains all the MIG welders that can be used and bought for home and give premium results. The most highly demanding home use MIG welders are Forney Easy Weld 140 and Hobart 140 for budget users whereas, if you are looking for an ultra-high-end machine which is beast then Hobart 500536is the best option irrespective of its price range.
